name: Careless Whisper
description:
grants stack of Whispers when you execute a Basic attack that damages an enemy.

Empowered Whispers is applied to you if you gain 5 Whispers in 12 seconds.

Empowered Whispers increases your Critical Strike by 10% and your Critical Damage by 10% for 7 seconds.
shortDescription: Passive: Basic Attacks Buff Crit Stats
